name: Rocket Crane Simulator 2022
description:
Welcome to Rocket Crane Simulator 2022, where you will control a rocket powered crane apparatus. 

Drop cargo in the correct color, and pilot the rocket to the color of the cargo you just dropped. Don't mess up!

Make sure to read the readme for full instructions & Controls!

(PS: if your having trouble finding the cargo boxes while flying the rocket, the top left has black, the bottom left has blue, the top right is yellow, and the bottom right is purple)
